sentences.english: And along the Strand, up Queen Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 流过河滨大街，直上维多利亚街。

sentences.english: We last saw the boy playing nearby the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 本人们比来还看到阿谁小男孩在河滨玩。

sentences.english: And along the Strand up Q en Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 流过河滨大街，直上维多利亚街。

sentences.english: Could you tell us about Riverside Park?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我们讲讲河滨公园吗？

sentences.english: There stand two white houses by the river.
sentences.chinese: 河滨矗立着两座白房子。

sentences.english: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.chinese: 观光客和本地人都会沿着塞纳河的河滨步道漫步。

sentences.english: When I was in the countryside, I often walked by the riverside.
sentences.chinese: 我正在乡下时常常正在河滨安步。

sentences.english: Oh, my three favorite parks are Riverside Park.
sentences.chinese: 哦，河滨公园是我最喜欢的三个公园之一。

sentences.english: and I love Riverside Park. At one time, they were trying to close it,
They live at No. 24 Riverside Street.
My friends went to Dajia Riverside Park in Taipei to watch the dragon boat races.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友到了台北的大佳河滨公园观看龙舟赛。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Riverside Park?
Yeah. I live on The East Side, but it's on The West Side,
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我住在东区，但河滨公园位于西区。

sentences.english: But a lot of people in the summer go there.
sentences.chinese: 但在夏天，总是有很多人前往河滨公园。

sentences.english: On hot summer days the clear and cold water flowed over the little beaches where I fished.
sentences.chinese: 在炎炎夏日，清澈冰凉的河水流过我钓鱼的小河滨。

definition: Lakeside district/Hubin district of Sanmenxia city 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1 men2 xia2 shi4], Henan
encircling the city (of walls, ring road etc)/around the city
Jinjiang district of Chengdu city 成都市[Cheng2 du1 shi4], Sichuan
